top_categories.workout_context: At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
50ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Safari Gravel Race's Kenyan safari, Adventure gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Safari Gravel Race's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before June.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
5,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Safari Gravel Race. Train it until it feels boring.
At Safari Gravel Race, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 5,000ft of climbing on kenyan safari gravel does to your power file on race day.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Safari Gravel Race, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Two threshold sessions per week without the recovery cost of VO2max work. For 100 miles, sustainable FTP gains matter more than peak power.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Safari Gravel Race’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Safari Gravel Race. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Safari Gravel Race requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on kenyan safari gravel to build confidence. Expect: kenyan safari, adventure gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 100 miles of kenyan safari gravel in Kenya.
